Master Clayton:
I asked one dwarf-craftsman make me a tool, that I need.
He sent me a list of the required things.
I got the most of these things except a Grudge Crystals.
Please go to Floran Village and hunt for Watchman of the Plains, Roughly-Hewn Rock Golem, Delu Lizardman Supplier, Delu Lizardman Special Agent, Cursed Seer, Delu Lizardman Commander and Delu Lizardman Shaman. Collect and bring me 30 Enmity Crystals.
